snippet.textDisplay:
I swear God speaks thru Yoongi whenever I need help.

In junior/senior year of high school we were all being pushed to choose a college and career but I had no clue what that would be for me. There were so many things I liked but not enough to pursue solely, or I thought I wasn’t very good at. I was stressing out and had several breakdowns and cried on many occasions. But, and I used this for my yearbook quote, Yoongi said something like, “It’s okay if you don’t have a dream. It’s possible to not have one. If you’re happy, that’s all that matters.” Not only did that bring me a tremendous amount of comfort and make me realize that success doesn’t just mean going to an expensive university and making tons of money, but I also did figure out what I wanted to do in life. I’m planning to become and interpreter as I have studied Spanish all 4 yrs in high school, and I have watch so much korean media so am learning both.

Today tho, I just had another breakdown. So I love singing and dancing (hence my love of kpop) and have ever since I was little. Problem is, I have horrible stage fright. Like I literally cannot even sing in the car with my family unless I do so VERY quietly. But, bc I love singing so much, I am taking a voice class this semester in college and my first performance is tomorrow. To try and help me choose between two songs and try to get over this fear enough that I can actually produce sound in class, I asked my mom to come help me. However, I kept choking on my words and instead played her a recording of me singing each song for her to choose from while I cried. And it wasn’t little tears it was snotty nose and puffy eyes kinda crying. This was only about an hr ago and I decided to watch some YouTube to try to calm down and decided to watch this video. And again Yoongi said something that touched me. He was saying around 3:00 that the message they want fans to take away is basically overcoming your shadows and being able to move forward. My shadow is not feeling adequate enough and comparing myself to others. But the fact that he said that when I most needed to hear it. I am convinced God is using them for his glory. Whether or not you believe, and Ik bts doesnt, that’s okay but this group has helped me thru so much in my life and I’m so blessed and grateful to have become an army
